thread.title: Gary - Northland New Zealand
thread.title_full: SmartBuyGlasses New Zealand reviewed by Gary - Northland New Zealand

author: Gary - Northland New Zealand
title: Gary - Northland New Zealand
text:
Thank you SmartBuy Glasses. This is the fifth pair of glasses I have bought through your online website, all optical with my own prescription and I couldn't be happier with product, price and service.
I have recommended you to others and will continue to do so.
